org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.re
Class REStar

java.lang.Object
  org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.Logic
      org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.re.RegularExpression
          org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.re.REStar
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class REStar
extends RegularExpression

This class represents the Kleene star of a regular expression.

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai
See Also:
